name: The Big Speech
description:
This game is best enjoyed if read aloud.

You are a politician representing the proud (and slightly rich) district of East Northbrook. They paid big money to be here, and are counting on you to convince them that you are the representative they need in government to further their interests. This is your moment. Give 'em The Big Speech.

Give them... The BS

Made for O2A2 Jam 2020
